item.title: Biden concedes stimulus checks fueled spike in inflation...
item.description:

President Biden insisted inflation is at a three-decade high because “people have more money now” as a result of his $1.9 trillion COVID-19 stimulus legislation.

item.title: Overlooked DNA may be what separates humans from other primates...
item.description:
www.jpost.com
Researchers grew brain cells from humans and chimpanzees using stem cells and compared the two cell types, finding that the two primates use the non-coded part of their DNA in different ways.

item.title: Gadhafi son announces candidacy for president of Libya...
item.description:
apnews.com
CAIRO (AP) — The son and one-time heir apparent of late Libyan dictator Moammar Gadhafi announced Sunday his candidacy for the country's presidential election next month, Libya's election agency said.
